text:
Darkling beetles are known for their armor-like
exo-skeletons

and their ability to thrive in dry
places. They also know a thing or two
The flex their abdomens like belly dancers
this pushes oxygen through their tracheal tubes
For a long time scientists assumed that only adult bugs pumped their abs to breathe.
researchers have found that teenagers do it too. However,
the teens pump their abs to breathe only forty percent of the time.
The rest at the time researchers believe the pumping

might help blood circulate through the
fragile bodies
as they prepare to enter adulthood.
